dublin_core.dcvalue: mHealth Alliance Publication To bring about a step change in the fight against tuberculosis TB we need new tools and simple affordable innovations to better detect people suffering from this disease Could mHealth be a solution A new paper from the mHealth Alliance and Stop TB Partnership explores this topic Washington DC and Geneva mHealth Alliance and Stop TB Partnership May 2012

The Role of mHealth in the Fight Against Tuberculosis
